tweets.text:
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA I dont know if the current stink in Werrington is from the landfill, if it is the reach the smell has got is ungodly.
My heart goes out to every person nearby this horror

From new years day 2021, to March 31 there have been 11587 complaints made to the @EnvAgencyMids about Walleys Quarry landfill, run by @RedIndustries2. Last night was one of the worst in memory for the toxic fumes entering our homes.
@JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA  Resign!!!!

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency And this is one of many reasons why the town has no confidence or trust in the @EnvAgency any more, their decisions seem too political to have their vision & values at the heart of their actions, we wonder if it’s because there is too much money involved

Worked yesterday and today & have a full on diary for tomorrow yet know already it’s going to be impossible because the fumes are starting to seep into my home again. Tell me how I’m supposed to be effective at work tomorrow with no sleep tonight again @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency

@MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency Exterior of the site such is the breakdown of trust at this point.Local media have reported but we’re struggling to engage national media,they didn’t even turn up for the community protest as lockdown eased which was really disappointing. Any tips to engage national press?

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

tweets.text: @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency One weekend at the end of Feb the @EnvAgency received over a thousand complaints as the smell was so bad. They had installed monitoring facilities so we thought at least they'd have the data to prove the problem.....They hadn't turned them on.

Outstanding reporting from @joe_crowley on @BBCPanorama tonight on the scandalous state of our rivers - building on the work of brilliant river activists, including @WindrushWasp & @UnderwaterMedia. Glad they went big on illegal spills. Where is enforcement from @EnvAgency?

tweets.text: .@EnvAgency's claim in @HackneyEars article https://t.co/c251ZhzeoQ & elsewhere that there's 'no evidence of harm to wildlife or of sewage' is beyond risible.They've suffered appalling budget cuts since @David_Cameron cuts in 2010's but hard to sympathise with such BS claims 2/9

This letter 👇is v welcome, thanks @mayorofhackney & also @colin_gram @HMUG_Hackney @DobbyWoods @plasticfreehkny & all who've helped bring attention to #plasticpollution #sewage on the #riverlea. We look forward to an effective response from @EnvAgency 1/9 https://t.co/adszfR3hl7

Important thread from @julian_kirby on the damaging pollution impacting on River Lea & how we must work together to tackle it now & in the future. The @EnvAgency must do more & Govt must start reinvesting in it in the Spending Review if they're to be taken seriously at @COP26 👇 https://t.co/kmGbKbY5J7

Never in my life in the UK did I think fresh air would be a luxury but this is our life now in #newcastleunderlyme A family member has taken me to get the freshest air because where I live cant provide us with that anymore.

@EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #STOPTHESTINK https://t.co/Dv2UXf6ZbA

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

tweets.text: @dpcarrington @guardian #walleysquarry #landfill has had 11.5k complaints to @EnvAgency in 2021 alone. Easily the most important environmental issue in the UK now. The toxic gases are getting into hospitals, schools, homes and causing health problems. Please help! #stopthestink

tweets.text:
@lesbashford I knew it was bad but didn't realise the extent!

Good to see @UnderwaterMedia getting his views out to a wider audience!

@BBCPanorama Walley’s quarry landfill run by @RedIndustries2 is out of control and releasing toxic gases into local hospitals, schools and homes. It’s a environmental emergency and @EnvAgency aren’t protecting us! Please help us! #stopthestink #panorama https://t.co/gZpvS7YCyk

tweets.text: @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency 2/2 various organisations to sort it. @EnvAgency have only now put monitors in & advised them to permanently cap 1/4 cells of the landfill.The levels have gone over the WHO safety levels on occasion & are consistently over WHO levels for nuisance.Can I advise how we can be heard?
Amazing programme from @BBCPanorama this evening concerning #river water and how large water companies often dump untreated #sewage into them! @EnvAgency @thameswater #shocking #illegal

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

tweets.text: https://t.co/dOzQqKqXWw

#BBCPanorama great program 2nite. Extremely disappointed to see    the lack of responsibility by water companies & excuses. 2025 etc. is too far to wait to deal with an active issue....It should be NOW!!! @EnvAgency you need to deal with this properly asap to stop it

tweets.text: Simple question @EnvAgencyMids. Why are you not monitoring air quality inside our homes? Our exposure times to the #walleysquarry gases are far longer than anything your MMF is picking up, due to the gases getting trapped in our homes whilst we sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/PrywMHIhJg

Trying to have some time to myself now my child’s in bed.

3months pregnant also and having to deal with the stink in my own home. Where is my HUMAN RIGHT to clean, fresh air? There is no escape. 
#stopthestink 

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC https://t.co/FhlAS7fzWz
@EnvAgency it’s time you are put on notice. Either enforce or be disbanded. Absolutely appalling #Panorama https://t.co/SHZhOstj7K

@MrNickKnowles 2/2 fumes. Air purifiers show high air pollution in the homes of pregnant women. High tech baby monitors are alarming at high levels of methane in the house. The local hospital is being plagued by it & many vulnerable people can’t ventilate their homes during COVID. Can u help?

tweets.text: 💨So the wind direction swings around again and the south & west of the Borough get the brunt of the stink this evening. The operator is now halfway to @EnvAgencyMids deadline to reduce the odours without any success. What is the EA’s plan B? @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL https://t.co/5Ssb90uU4h

The wind's shifted and with that comes the stink from #WalleysQuarry again. Friday night and Sunday night being gassed all night doesn't exactly set you up for the working week ahead @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @bbcmtd @ClareDinnisEA @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 #StopTheStink

Good luck all. If the #walleysquarry #landfill odours affects your businesses please remember to send your complaints to @EnvAgencyMids and encourage employees to report the stink to the EnvAgency on 0800 807060 #Redindustries  #lockdowneasing #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/mrGrUtTj5M
